response: as an ai language model, i cannot access external sources to determine whether there is any specific incident that requires protection of personal information or if any new regulations are being implemented in the online social media platform. however, in general, protecting personal information regarding data privacy is crucial for maintaining individual rights and preventing misuse of such sensitive information. social media companies must prioritize the safety and security of their users, ensuring that their data is kept confidential and protected from unauthorized access or exploitation.<|endoftext|>
